scripts.mnist:train: cd model && cargo run --release -- train --dataset mnist --epochs 10 --batch-size 64
scripts.mnist:eval: cd model && cargo run --release -- eval --dataset mnist
scripts.mnist:wasm: cd model && wasm-pack build --out-dir pkg/mnist --release --target web --no-default-features --features mnist-only
scripts.mnist:all: pnpm mnist:train && pnpm mnist:eval && pnpm mnist:deploy
scripts.cifar10:train: cd model && cargo run --release -- train --dataset cifar10 --epochs 10 --batch-size 32
scripts.cifar10:eval: cd model && cargo run --release -- eval --dataset cifar10
scripts.cifar10:wasm: cd model && wasm-pack build --out-dir pkg/cifar10 --release --target web --no-default-features --features cifar10-only
scripts.cifar10:all: pnpm cifar10:train && pnpm cifar10:eval && pnpm cifar10:deploy
scripts.model:clean: cd model && cargo clean && rm -rf pkg
scripts.setup: pnpm install && cd web && pnpm install && pnpm cifar10:setup
scripts.test:infer:mnist: cd model && cargo run --release -- infer --dataset mnist --path my_digits/
scripts.test:infer:cifar10: cd model && cargo run --release -- infer --dataset cifar10 --path my_digits/
scripts.help: echo 'Available commands:' && echo '  pnpm setup' && echo '  pnpm mnist:all' && echo '  pnpm cifar10:all' && echo '  pnpm demo:mnist' && echo '  pnpm demo:cifar10' && echo 'See SCRIPTS.md for more details'
